duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee environmental staff across various projects and programs, collaborating with other departments and disciplines within the company.
Manage the implementation of environmental assessment, review, permitting, and approval processes for project development and execution.
Establish and maintain systems to ensure compliance with environmental regulations and minimize environmental impact during projects.
Develop and coordinate environmental awareness, training, and outreach efforts to support major project development and execution.
Handle environmental budgets and costs, including associated reporting and forecasting.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in a related field including, but not limited to environmental studies, physical sciences, social sciences, engineering, or similar (Master’s degree or professional certification desirable)
